.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.2.0 (2015-01-14)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added the new ``job_status`` method which can retrieve the job status of a
  specific job from a project. See docs for usage.
* Increased and improved test coverage.

0.1.0 (2014-09-16)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
